welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Schulzendorf, Germany! Known for its beautiful nature and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Berlin-Schoenefeld Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Berlin-Schoenefeld Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Berlin Brandenburg Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Berlin Brandenburg Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Berlin-tegel / Otto Lilienthal Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Berlin-tegel / Otto Lilienthal Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
